translated: The Buddha Speaks the Great White Parasol DhÄraá¹‡Ä« SÅ«tra
Translated by the Yuan Dynasty Indian Master Junbian Jizhen and the Translator-in-Chief Monk Zhenzhi
Homage to all the most wonderful and supreme teachers.
If one wishes to cultivate the White Parasol Buddha Mother,
in a quiet room,
sit on a soft and stable carpet.
Then make the vow,
for the sake of all sentient beings in the six realms,
in order to enable them to attain liberation within saá¹ƒsÄra,
vow to attain perfect supreme enlightenment.
Having made the vow,
in the space in front, visualize the assembly of the White Parasol Buddha.
In that place, with a sincere mind, recite the Three Refuges.
The assembly melts into light
and merges into one's own body, which becomes light.
Then recite the SÄmantaka mantra.
Visualize everything as empty.
Upon that emptiness, on a lunar disc,
visualize a white Oá¹ƒ syllable.
The syllable Oá¹ƒ emits light.
The light returns and transforms the seed syllable into a white umbrella with a golden handle.
On top of the handle is the syllable Oá¹ƒ.
The syllable emits light and returns.
The seed syllable transforms into the White Umbrella Buddha Mother.
She has one face, two arms, and three eyes.
She sits in vajra posture.
Her right hand makes the gesture of fearlessness.
Her left hand holds a white umbrella in front of her chest.
She is adorned with various necklaces.
Her body is pure white like the sun shining on a snow mountain.
She has the appearance of joy, manifesting the nature of selflessness.
One should contemplate her as if reflected in a mirror.
When wishing to recite the mantra,
in one's own heart, above the lotus sun disc,
the syllable Oá¹ƒ surrounds the heart.
The mantra, long or short, is held there.
Emitting light, it dispels all one's own and others' karmic hindrances and obstacles.
After contemplating this, then recite.
If feeling tired and wishing to offer food,
Then place the food offering in front.
Recite the three-syllable mantra of Oá¹ƒ aá¸¥ hÅ«á¹ƒ to accept it.
It transforms into nectar.
In the space in front, invite the Buddha-mother White Parasol as the foremost,
Along with the twenty-two mountain and tomb-dwelling yin mothers,
And the seven kinds of buddhas and the perfectly enlightened ones of the ten directions.
After the three kinds of excellent and pure Brahmas, Indra, and their retinues have been invited,
Imagine the tongue transforming into a vajra light tube.
Recite the food offering mantra, which goes:
Oá¹ƒ sarva tathÄgata udakaá¹ƒ pÄdyaá¹ƒ tathÄmaá¹‡á¸alaá¹ƒ hÅ«á¹ƒ phaá¹­. After reciting this three or five times,
Then recite the praises and prayers.
Request the fulfillment of your wishes and so forth.
Send off the Buddha assembly.
Discard the food offering in a clean place.
Dedicate the merit to goodness.
A-li-ye-ta-ta-a-tuo-wu-shi-ni-zhe-xi-ni-ta-mo-de-li-na-mo-a-mo-luo-ji-ta-xi-ni-fan-yu-sheng-yi-qie-ru-lai-ding-ji-zhong-chu-bai-san-gai-fo-mu-yu-wu-neng-di-zong-chi-jing-li-zui-shang-san-bao-hua-yan.
Thus have I heard.
At one time, in the past,
he resided in the excellent and wonderful heavenly abode of the Thirty-three Celestials, the dwelling place of the gods.
Together with the great bhiká¹£us, the bodhisattvas, and the assembly of Indra, the lord of the gods.
At that time, in the past, he sat on a lotus seat.
He entered the samÄdhi of universally observing the topknot.
Swiftly, in the past, from the topknot
he manifested this dhÄraá¹‡Ä« secret mantra Dharma practice.
He paid homage to the Perfectly Enlightened One and all the bodhisattvas.
He paid homage to the Perfectly Enlightened One.
He paid homage to the wonderful Dharma.
He paid homage to the great assembly.
I pay homage to the seven koá¹­is of true and ultimate Buddhas, and to the great assembly of Å›rÄvakas.
I pay homage to all those who destroy worldly enemies and so forth.ğŸ”½I pay homage to all those who are stream-enterers and so forth.
I pay homage to all those who are once-returners and so forth.
I pay homage to all those who are non-returners and so forth.ğŸ”½I pay homage to all those who transcend the truth of the world and so forth.
I pay homage to all those who have entered the truth and so forth.
I pay homage to the celestial immortals who curse and have the power of assistance.
I pay homage to all those who recite and uphold the bright mantras and attain accomplishment.
I pay homage to the pure Brahmins.
I pay homage to Indra.
I pay homage to the lord of the powerful and beautiful ones who can make ascetics retreat.
I pay homage to the one who is revered by the beautiful and powerful five-handed seal-bearer's son.
I pay homage to the one who is revered by all the female spirits dwelling in the cemetery in the middle of the triple-layered city that can be destroyed by the beautiful and powerful one.
I pay homage to the Buddha who emerges from the seed of the TathÄgata.
Homage to the Buddha of the Lotus Family.ğŸ”½Homage to the Buddha of the Vajra Family.
Homage to the Buddha of the Jewel Family.
Homage to the Buddha of the Great Elephant Family.
Homage to the Buddha of the Youthful Family.ğŸ”½Homage to the Buddha of the Dragon Family.
Homage to the Buddha of the Courageous Division, the Weapon King.ğŸ”½Homage to the Buddha of Immeasurable Light.
Homage to the Buddha of Immovable.
Homage to the Buddha of the Medicine Master Lapis Lazuli Light King.
Homage to the Buddha of the Shala Tree King, the Flower Fruit Fully Complete.
Homage to Shakyamuni Buddha.
Homage to the Buddha of the Jewel Supreme King.ğŸ”½Homage to the Buddha of the Most Wonderful Universal Excellence.
Homage to the Buddha of the Lord of the Masses.
Homage to the Buddha of the Eye Fully Complete, the Upa-Lata Fragrance Supreme King.
Having paid homage to them there,
The mother of destruction emerges from the topknot of all Tathagatas, the mother of the white umbrella Buddha, the great invincible mother of the Hui-cha.
With this, all those who emerge are cut off by evil demons.
It can also decisively cut off all other bright mantras.
It can also turn back untimely violent deaths.
It can also liberate sentient beings from all bonds.
It can also turn back all dislikes and bad dreams.
It can also destroy the eighty-four thousand demons.ğŸ”½It can also delight the twenty-eight lunar mansions.
It can also subdue the eight major lunar mansions.
It can also turn back all enemies.
It can also destroy the most violent dislikes and bad dreams.
It can also rescue from the difficulties of poison, weapons, water, fire, and so forth.
There is none who can rival the great tight mother, the great powerful mother, the mother of great strength
The mother of great blazing, the mother of great power, the mother of great strength, the mother of the great white canopy
The mother of blazing hanging ribbons and white clothes, the holy mother of salvation, endowed with frowns of anger
The rosary of the victorious Vajra, the lotus, the famous Vajra
The mother who destroys with the vajra wall and so forth.ğŸ”½The mother who is worshipped by the gentle buddhas and so forth,
The great mother who possesses the power of gentle characteristics.ğŸ”½The powerful mother who is the holy savior,
The mother who is the indestructible vajra iron mallet.ğŸ”½The mother who holds the seed of the vajra youth,
The mother with a vajra rosary in her hand.ğŸ”½The mother with great red color and a jewel,
The mother with the seed syllable, the vajra, and the topknot of praise.ğŸ”½The mother with the seed characteristics, slender and vajra-like,
The mother with eyes possessing the radiance of golden light.ğŸ”½The mother with the vajra lamp and white color,
The mother with lotus eyes and moonlight.
The gathering of mudras of all of them, for the sake of power.
May they protect me, protect me.ğŸ”½Oá¹ƒ liá¹ƒ Å›ivÄ na bhayaá¹ƒ da tvÄá¹ƒ tathÄgatÄá¸¥ |

Mantra for protecting me, arising from the topknot of all tathÄgatas, white parasol
Buddha mother.
Vajra topknot, great revolving mother.
Endowed with a thousand great arms, mother.
Having a thousand great heads, mother.
Endowed with a hundred thousand koá¹­is of eyes, non-dual blazing, endowed with characteristics, vajra-vast, great white mother.
Ruler of the three realms, surrounded mother.
Always protect me, protect me.

Oá¹ƒ, danger from kings, danger from thieves, danger from fire, danger from water, danger from poison, danger from weapons, danger from foreign armies, danger from famine, danger from enemies, danger from epidemics, danger from lightning, danger from untimely violent death, danger from earthquakes, danger from star-arrows, danger from royal punishments, danger from gods, danger from dragons, danger from lightning, danger from flying in the sky, danger from angry ferocious beasts.

May I attain peace and auspiciousness among all of them, including the heavenly demons, dragon demons, asura demons, wind spirit demons, flying demons, scent-seeking demons, doubting spirit demons, large-bellied walking demons, obstructive demons, yaká¹£a demons, hungry ghost demons, sky-walking mother demons, flesh-eating demons, emerging demons, jar-bag demons, stinking demons, body-stinking demons, withering demons, forgetting demons, maddening demons, sleep-suffocating demons, suppressing demons, and the Kui lunar mansion demons.

Among the power-stealing ghosts, appearance-stealing ghosts, childbirth-palace-eating ghosts, blood-drinking ghosts, embryo-eating ghosts, flesh-eating ghosts, fat-eating ghosts, marrow-eating ghosts, fat-and-garment-eating ghosts, life-taking ghosts, vomit-eating ghosts, feces-eating ghosts, urine-eating ghosts, orifice-flow-eating ghosts, leftover-eating ghosts, saliva-eating ghosts, mucus-eating ghosts, foam-eating ghosts, pus-eating ghosts, offering-food-eating ghosts, garland-eating ghosts, scent-eating ghosts, fragrance-eating ghosts, intention-stealing ghosts, flower-eating ghosts, fruit-eating ghosts, seedling-eating ghosts, burnt-offering-eating ghosts, and so forth.
I wish to attain peace and auspiciousness.
All of those and all the spells created by the demons will be decisively struck by this scepter as I roam everywhere, and the spells created will be decisively struck by this scepter.
The spells created by the sky-goers and the sky-going mothers will be decisively struck by this scepter.
The spells created by the great beast lords will be decisively struck by this scepter.
The spells created by the childless ones will be decisively struck by this scepter.
The spells created by those who fly in the sky, the truthful ones, and so forth will be decisively struck by this scepter.
The spells created by the great black ones, the mothers of darkness, and so forth will be decisively struck by this scepter.
The spells created by those who hold the skull-cup will be decisively struck by this scepter.
The spells created by those who bring victory, make honey, and accomplish the ancient meaning will be decisively struck by this scepter.
The mantras created by the four sisters are to be severed and struck with the pestle.ğŸ”½The mantras created by Bhisana, Ugra, Nanda, and Samudra are to be severed and struck with the pestle.
The mantras created by Subhadra are to be severed and struck with the pestle.ğŸ”½The mantras created by Dveshaghna are to be severed and struck with the pestle.
The mantras created by Vairaghya are to be severed and struck with the pestle.
The mantras created by VajrapÄá¹‡i, Lord of Secrets, are to be severed and struck with the pestle.

Moreover, there is a one-day epidemic
and also a two-day illness, a three-day illness, a four-day illness, a seven-day illness,
a constant epidemic
and an endless epidemic.ğŸ”½The illness of swelling arises based on wind,ğŸ”½the illness that arises based on bile,
the illness that arises based on phlegm,
and the illness that arises based on the combination of all three.
May all illnesses and bodily illnesses be removed.

Furthermore, diseases of the body, not advancing food and drink, eye diseases, nose diseases, mouth diseases, neck diseases, heart diseases, throat diseases, ear diseases, tooth diseases, mental heat diseases, brain diseases, half rib diseases, back joint diseases, stomach diseases, waist diseases, urethra diseases, thigh diseases, calf diseases, hand diseases, foot diseases, limb diseases, and all limb diseases.
May they be removed and may they be protected.
The Great White Parasol Mother, the Vajra Crest Great Reversing Mother,
With those who emerge within these twelve yojanas, the rising corpse, the sky-walking mother,
Furthermore, epidemics, scabies, itching, smallpox, leprosy, chapped skin, hemorrhoids, burning sores, tuberculosis, and wonderful sores.
Also, emaciation, fear, illness, and the poison of jewels, the poison of combination, the poison of bewitching, and the dangers of fire and water.
Also, quarrels, enmities, harm, and untimely death.
Also, the insects such as the deri-ma-bu-gar, deri-lata, scorpions, vipers, mongooses, lions, tigers, bears, and wolves, as well as the water beasts and flies that take others' lives,
all of those mantras,
are all bound in all deportments.
Binding the other mantras,
binding all the mantras of the demons,

Either wear it on the body or on the neck.
Then one will be able to reach the end of one's life.
Poison cannot harm it, weapons cannot harm it.
Fire cannot burn it, water cannot float it away.
Precious poisons cannot affect it, mixed poisons cannot harm it.
Spells cannot destroy it, untimely death cannot encroach upon it.
All enemies and demons, as well as all evil friends,
Everywhere they are loved and respected.
Also, as many as the sands of the Ganges, koá¹­is, and 84,000 vajra species,
Also protect, also rescue, also cover and protect.
They make pleasing and beloved ones.
Also, within 84,000 great kalpas, one attains the knowledge of past lives.
Also, in every life one does not receive the smell of giving obstacles, rÄká¹£asas, hungry ghosts, or the smell of the body.
Also, one does not receive a poor body among humans.
Moreover, it is the merit of creating a world of destruction to be endowed with immeasurable and innumerable Ganges river-like merits of right enlightenment.
Moreover, one who always upholds the White Parasol Buddha Mother who emerges from the crown of all Tathagatas, who is invincible, and who is the Great Retinue Mother,
does not practice pure conduct but also accomplishes pure conduct.
One who is unable to endure also becomes able to endure.
One who is impure also becomes pure.
One who does not have the precepts of the Upholders of the Precepts obtains the precepts of the Upholders of the Precepts.
One who does not observe the precepts also accomplishes the precepts.
Even if one commits the five heinous crimes, they can be completely purified without remainder.
Past karmic hindrances will all be eliminated.
If a woman wishes to have a child,
she can uphold the White Parasol Buddha Mother who emerges from the crown of all Tathagatas, who is invincible, and who is the Great Retinue Mother.
She will obtain a child who is endowed with longevity, blessings, and spiritual powers.
After death, she will be reborn in the Land of Ultimate Bliss.
Moreover, if people, cows, livestock, or crops are afflicted with disease,
And harm, and bring about illness and obstacles,
And in the midst of all other armies in battle,

Then one can place this White Parasol Buddha Mother who emerges from the topknot of all Tathagatas, who is invincible, and the Great Retarding Mother,ğŸ”½On top of a banner after making vast offerings.
Take the banner and place it on top of the great city gate,
Or in the palace, or in the village,
Or in the hamlet, or in the river plain, or in a quiet place,
Or in the place of the invincible Great Retarding Mother, and make vast offerings.
Then one can quickly make the country peaceful and secure.
One can also be gentle and good, and prevent illness, harm, and fighting,
And all other armies.

Having accomplished this,
the nÄga kings will rain down at the proper time.
The Perfectly Awakened One, and Bodhi, courageous awareness,
The gods, asuras, and humans,
And all the gandharvas of the world, and so forth,
All greatly rejoice, emerging from the place of destruction, praising what has been said.
Oá¹ƒ, on the wondrous seat of the lotus moon disc, the vajra cross-legged body is white.
The left hand holds a white parasol at the chest, fully praised with a white umbrella.
The right hand forms the gesture of fearlessness, with a joyful smile and a slender body.
Praised and revered, O Mother of the Buddhas, you are embraced by all the Perfectly Awakened Ones.
In all places where beings are subdued, you manifest various bodies according to their type.
Greatly adorned with treasures, extremely beautiful and delightful, I praise the abode of the mother.
Om, invincible, greatly tight mother, great dhupa mother, powerful mother,
Greatly blazing mother, great powerful mother, great white parasol mother, powerful mother,
Blazing hanging necklace white-robed mother, holy savior Tara, greatly wrathful and wrinkled,
Holy worldly vajra rosary reciter, lotus radiant vajra name,
Invincible with rosary, vajra wall and so forth destroying mother,
Gentle Buddha and so forth offering mother, gentle appearance powerful greatly endowed mother,
Holy savior Tara, powerful mother, undying vajra iron mallet mother,
Vajra youth holding seed mother, vajra hand seed rosary,
Great red color and jewel mother, seed light vajra named crown knot,
Seed appearance slender vajra mother, like golden light endowed eye mother,
Vajra Lamp and White Mother, Lotus Eyes and Moonlight Mother
Homage to the praised one in the gathering of mudras, the mother who emerges with destruction, the white-covered mother
The mother who emerges from the topknot of ÅšÄkyamuni, the vajra topknot mother who turns back
The great mother with a thousand arms and hands, the mother with a hundred million eyes
The non-dual blazing one with various characteristics, the vajra vast great white mother
The mother in the midst of the lord of the three realms, I seek utmost protection for myself
Oá¹ƒ, fear of kings, thieves, water, fire, poison, weapons, famine, and evil spirits, illness
Lightning, untimely death, earthquake, punishment by the king, and so forth
Lightning, fear of flying in the sky, scattered, evil beasts, tigers, and so forth, in the midst of great difficulties
At all times, I beg for protection, the heavenly demons and so forth, all obstructing demons
Able to steal power and hungry ghosts, wind, bile, phlegm, and so forth, in the midst of great illnesses
I beg for protection at all times from greed, ignorance, anger, and other afflictions,
The ten unwholesome actions, the five heinous crimes, prohibited acts, naturally evil actions, and so forth,
And the fear of the suffering of the lower realms. I, a fool, now seek protection.
With the iron hook of great compassion, I beg to be protected as if I were a beloved child.
May you always protect me. The praise and prayer to the great white parasol dhÄraá¹‡Ä« is completed.
